title: New: CATHEDRALS – Harlem
body:
LA duo **CATHEDRALS** became one of the most talked about new artists of last year with the release of their debut track, [Unbound](http://admin.

crackintheroad.com/music/24423-new-cathedrals-unbound/). Dreamy, synth pop, it put them on the radar of numerous blogs, and in turn labels. Their second release, _Harlem_, is bolder and dare I even say _heavier _admirably not simply reverting to replicating their debut track, but actively pushing on for a new, more confident sound, complete with guitar solo. If their first outing wasn’t enough to convince, there’s no doubting now that **CATHEDRALS** are the real deal.
